item.title: Report X-2023100180
item.description:
Report X-2023100180

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was recovered from the 1-3 unload and placed in a lined tote. DescribePack: The one drum is fitted with a vented cap that will not seal properly causing a loss of product. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in the Hazmat cage on the Corrosive pallet.

item.title: Report X-2023100175
item.description:
Report X-2023100175

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-20
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was recovered from the 2-4 Unload and placed in a lined tote. DescribePack: One of the two jerricans of degreaser was equipped with a lid that would not adequately seal, allowing for a leak to occur. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in the Hazmat cage on the Corrosive Pallet.

item.title: Report E-2023100229
item.description:
Report E-2023100229

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-19T15:12:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: SAINT LOUIS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 55gallon drum of tert- butyl acetate (un1123) releasing 0.5 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
